# libraries
```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(leaflet)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

# set variable for australian map
```{r}
aus_map <- readOGR(dsn=paste0(getwd(),"/data2"), 
                   layer="TM_WORLD_BORDERS_SIMPL-0.3.shp"
                   )
```


# test
```{r}
m <- leaflet(data.frame(lat = 55.71654, lng = 12.47484))
m <-  addCircles(m, popup = "testpopup")
m <-  addTiles(m)
m

saveWidget(m, file="testmap.html", selfcontained = TRUE)
```
